title: Contacts search works only with notes in English and couldn't locate contacts by notes in Russian
content:
Contacts app search works only with notes written in English and could not locate contacts by notes in Russian.

I've just switched to Pixel 4a (5G) and noticed this annoying issue. Latest Android 11 on a new phone. Cache clearing does not help. 

If I edit any contact and write down notes in English and try to search by this English description it appears in search results.
